creditline: Gift of Raymond A. and Ruth A. Reister
description: standing unisex figure, head adorned with tall, rounded headdress; face is simple with flat, white porcelain eyes, a small carved nose, and a mouth somewhat obscured by round, fabric pouch under chin, which ties at back of neck; figure's abdomen is covered by protruding cylinder with mirrored-front; figure's legs and feet are carved directly into a circular base; overall color of piece is the brown of clay in which it is encrusted; however, there is some red in the fabric piece tied at neck
inscription:
Inscription

in white paint at base near PL foot: [FX92197]
medium: Wood, porcelain, clay, plant fibers, mirror, fabric
title: Power figure
